name: WGTRRacer
description:
Early Access v.0.7.7.7

Condition for today.

Possibility to Change UI.

Possibility to Change the Color of the Body, Wheels, Headlights, Windows.

Possibility to Change Wheels.

Preview Features

https://youtu.be/8JU43gdQle8

36 Cars.

8 Cameras.

The ability to rotate the camera 360 degrees.

4 Maps.

Custom Map Creation

Ability to Change Weather, Time.

in Demo You Can't Buy Cars.
